data.event: The municipality (originally the parish) of Holt was established on 1 January 1838 (see formannskapsdistrikt).

event.title: 1 January 1881, a part of Holt with 52 inhabitants was moved

data.event: On 1 January 1881, a part of Holt with 52 inhabitants was moved to the neighboring municipality of Dypv책g, and on 1 July 1919 another part of Holt with 14 inhabitants was moved to the neighboring municipality of Moland.

event.title: 1 July 1919 another part of Holt with 14 inhabitants was moved

data.event: On 1 January 1881, a part of Holt with 52 inhabitants was moved to the neighboring municipality of Dypv책g, and on 1 July 1919 another part of Holt with 14 inhabitants was moved to the neighboring municipality of Moland.

event.title: 1 January 1960, Holt (population: 3,759), Dypv책g (population: 1,805), and Tvedestrand (population: 868) were merged

data.event: On 1 January 1960, Holt (population: 3,759), Dypv책g (population: 1,805), and Tvedestrand (population: 868) were merged to form an enlarged municipality of Tvedestrand.
